root.name: Freestyle Street Soccer
root.description: OverviewUrban Freestyle Soccer was originally published by Acclaim in PAL regions and a few weeks later it was released in the US exclusively through Blockbuster. The game takes place in urban settings and you progress by claiming more and more parts of the city by winning games of soccer. Gusto Games developed it.

similar_games.game: Outlaw Golf: 9 More Holes of X-Mas
